relation.text: was written around the 26 th of September
went from thence to St Leonards for a Week
left it together on the 18 th of October
the end of this Month -- adieu my dear Friend -- Car a mi a write
bleſs you -- CMG -- To Mrs Dickenson Taxal Chapel le Frith Derbyshire Honble Miſs Gunning Octer . 1786
